QuestData.Title: Paragon of the Undying Army
QuestData.Description:
Your continued advancement of the Undying Army objectives has earned you the continued respect of our forces.
I have been authorized to provide you with a portion of recent spoils of war in gratitude. Please join me at the Seat of the Primus to collect these spoils at your earliest convenience.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Nalcorn Talsen at the Theater of Pain.
